oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A drop of water
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Egypt--Rural conditions; Egypt -- Social life and customs
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color, 18 min. Idealized film made by the Egyptian film maker, Asma elBakry, in the oases (Dakhla 1); some shots of material culture, in general the emphasis is on the visual aspect.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Ethnographic and Anthropological Films - Egypt and Beyond
